name: Santa's Slay (Josh Kitchen)
description:
CW: Swearing, blood, dead reindeer

Make sure to play in fullscreen mode when playing in browser!

Warning! Long voice over scene at start - it's pretty funny though :D

Santa's sleigh crashed in the woods and you need to find a way home.

Unfortunatly, Santa's taken a liking to elf flesh...

Collect 7 elf body parts to create a frankenstein-elf-reindeer creature to fly home on!

Controls: WASD, LMB for 'torch', RMB to throw a jaffa cake (bait)

Modifiers: Brunch Club

Feedback welcome :)
